channel.title: Pinchy Claw
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Pinchy Claw" - Having trouble, is it still available?

item.title: Re: Pinchy Claw
item.content:encoded: O.k. thanks, that would explain it. I've never won when it was over 9000. :(

item.title: Re: Pinchy Claw
item.content:encoded: from what I know it still isâ€¦ however, you have to win with values over 9000 (9001 is common) and even then it's not 100% find chance. rather that's my understanding of getting the pinchy claw.

item.title: Pinchy Claw
item.content:encoded: O.k., just as the guide says, I'm having trouble. The wiki says that you need to play the crane game (on any difficulty) when the price is 9001 or more, and I have, but I didn't get the pinchy claw, so is it still available?
